OpenClaims_1.label: OpenClaims

LossRatio_1.label: LossRatio
LossRatio_1.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.Insurance_Policies_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = group q by all;ThisCust = foreach q generate "1. This Customer" as 'Display', {{coalesce(cell(Selected_Customer_1.result, 0, "Loss Ratio"),0).asObject()}} as 'Value';Avgforall = foreach q generate "2. Avg for all" as 'Display', {{coalesce(cell(CustomerMetrics_1.result, 0, "Loss Ratio"),0).asObject()}} as 'Value';result = union ThisCust, Avgforall;result = group result by ('Display');result = foreach result generate 'Display', sum('Value') as 'Loss Ratio';

TotalCustomers_1.label: TotalCustomers

Selected_Customer_1.label: Selected_Customer

CustomerMetrics_1.label: CustomerMetrics

TotalApprovedClaimCo_1.label: TotalApprovedClaimCost
TotalApprovedClaimCo_1.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.Insurance_Policies_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = group q by all;ThisCust = foreach q generate "1. This Customer" as 'Display', {{coalesce(cell(Selected_Customer_1.result, 0, "Claims_ApprovedAmount"),0).asObject()}} as 'Value';Avgforall = foreach q generate "2. Avg for all" as 'Display', {{coalesce(cell(CustomerMetrics_1.result, 0, "Claims_ApprovedAmount"),0).asObject()}} as 'Value';result = union ThisCust, Avgforall;result = group result by ('Display');result = foreach result generate 'Display', sum('Value') as 'Value';

TotalClaimsFiled_1.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.Insurance_Policies_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = group q by all;ThisCust = foreach q generate "1. This Customer" as 'Display', {{coalesce(cell(Selected_Customer_1.result, 0, "Claims_Count"),0).asObject()}} as 'Value';Avgforall = foreach q generate "2. Avg for all" as 'Display', {{coalesce(cell(CustomerMetrics_1.result, 0, "Claims_Count"),0).asObject()}} as 'Value';result = union ThisCust, Avgforall;result = group result by ('Display');result = foreach result generate 'Display', sum('Value') as 'Value';

ActiveClaims_1.label: ActiveClaims

GWP_Average_1.label: GWP_Average
GWP_Average_1.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.Insurance_Policies_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = group q by all;ThisCust = foreach q generate "1. This Customer" as 'Display', {{coalesce(cell(Selected_Customer_1.result, 0, "GrossWrittenPremium"),0).asObject()}} as 'Value';Avgforall = foreach q generate "2. Avg for all" as 'Display', {{coalesce(cell(CustomerMetrics_1.result, 0, "GrossWrittenPremium_forAll"),0).asObject()}} as 'Value';result = union ThisCust, Avgforall;result = group result by ('Display');result = foreach result generate 'Display', sum('Value') as 'Value';

parameters.text: This customer has filed a total of {{cell(Selected_Customer_1.result, 0, "Claims_Count").asObject()}} claims which is {{cell(CompareClaims_1.result, 0, "compare_claimcount").asObject()}} than average. The total value of all their approved claims is {{cell(CompareClaims_1.result, 0, "compare_claimamount").asObject()}} than average.

This customer is ranked {{cell(ThisCustomerRank_1.result, 0, "Rank").asObject()}} out of {{cell(TotalCustomers_1.result, 0, "unique_PolicyOwner_Name").asObject()}} customers for gross written premiums. This customer's loss ratio is lower than average.
